_comments.currency_symbol: The currency symbol to be displayed for product prices (e.g., '$', '€', '£').
_comments.display: Controls the visibility of different sections on the product card.
_comments.show_rating_on_card: Set to true to show the star rating, or false to hide it.
_comments.show_review_count_on_card: Set to true to show the total number of reviews next to the star rating.
_comments.show_description_on_card: Set to true to display the product's short description on the card.
_comments.show_reviews_on_card: Set to true to display the full customer reviews section at the bottom of the card.
_comments.badge: Configuration for the style of different badges on the product card.
_comments.discount_variant: The visual style for the discount badge. Options: 'default', 'secondary', 'destructive', 'outline'.
_comments.promo_type_classes: The Tailwind CSS classes to style the promo type badge (e.g., BOGO, New). This provides more styling flexibility.

badge.promo_type_classes: text-xs font-semibold px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full bg-accent/20 text-accent-foreground border border-accent
